【考法 1】 adj. 羞涩的： affectedly and usually flirtatiously shy or modest
【例】 Not wanting him to know that she was interested in him, she acted very coy at the dance. 她在舞会上故意装得很娇羞的样子，不想让他知道她喜欢他。
【近】 coquettish, demure, kittenish
【考法 2】 adj. 内向的： tending to avoid people and social situations
【例】 She was modest without being coy. 她很低调，但又不至于内向。
【近】 backward, bashful, diffident, introverted, modest, recessive, retiring, sheepish, shy, withdrawn
【反】 extroverted, immodest, outgoing 外向的
